tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Had gone to them for a general checkup. The clinic is nice and very well kept with a professional staff. While it is common in Mumbai that despite taking an appointment in advance people have to just arrive at the clinic and still take numbers causing a pile up of patients, *that was not the case here. If you take an appointment at 10 am they will be ready to see you at exactly 10 am*. 
Everything is systematic and planned as a clinic should be. During the checkup the doctor took their time to throughly examine me during which they also took photographs of my upper and lower jaw,  the session did not end there and after the checkup we were then seated in the doctor's cabin where they told me about the general health of my teeth and how i could improve upon it with the reference of the photographs that they had just taken, it is very rare to see a doctor take so much effort and time to explain their diagnosis. They know about the latest treatments  and have the latest instruments and equipments readily available to them at their clinic. I have always had two milk teeth in the front of my lower jaw that no dentist had ever bothered about, these milk teeth had caused the rest of my teeth to get misaligned and had resulted in me developing a crossbite and had just begun chipping away at one of the tooth in my lower jaw , something none of the other dentists i had visited had ever bothered to tell me. A problem is only a problem if it has a solution. Having never had a solution to my milk teeth they had never been a problem to me but just general check up with the doctor and she had recognized the problem and given me the solution in the form of aligners (more precise and almost invisible compared to braces) that they had recommended. Needless to say i was already impressed and decided to go forward with getting the aligners. 
Its been over a year that i have used these aligners and my teeth and jaw are now noticeably more correctly aligned with each other. Over that period i have visited them around 5 or 6 times for a follow up and every visit has been as impressive as my first, very efficient and informative. Keep up the great work.
reply_text: Hi Amogh, thank you so much for such a valuable and encouraging feedback. Amogh it is always an absolute pleasure having you at the clinic and you are undoubtedly one of our most favourites at The Dental Bond.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am extremely satisfied with the dental service provided by Dr. Farhath Sayad and the entire clinic. My experience with the tooth implant procedure was excellent, and I am truly pleased with the results. The clinic, Dental Bond, is clean and hygienic, and the staff are really humble. I highly recommend their services to anyone seeking professional dental care.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Farhath is an angel. I visited her for dental pain, which eventually had to be sorted out by two root canals, one of which was particularly difficult and complicated. She did not just treat me for my dental issue but also dealt with my dental anxiety with a lot of patience, warmth and kindness. At every point of the treatment, she has made sure that I am not facing any kind of pain or discomfort during the procedure.Throughout my treatment, she kept checking on me and it just made me feel so good that she is there for me, every step of the way!She genuinely cares and it shows! She goes out of her way to make her patients feel relaxed and comfortable.I am so glad I chose Dr. Farhath -  my teeth are thanking me!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Farhath has a warm comforting personality and truly believes that her patient should be comfortable and feel no pain at all. I have had root canals done before but this was by far my best experience. Dental Bond values the time of the patient and also has a very comfortable quiet ambience that is soothing. Treatments are quick and very professional. I would recommend Dr. Farhath and Dental Bond highly for the most stress free dental visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I‚Äôm very happy with the treatment I have received at Dental Bond. Dr. Farhath, Dr. Hussein and Dr Kalpana have explained my dental issues in detail, and allayed all my concerns. The way they explained me everything was very comforting. I‚Äôm very much thankful for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Inlays and Onlays,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr.Farhath and Dr.Husain and their entire team is remarkable! I for one had a lot of work done over a period of one month but every step was explained. I knew exactly what we were doing at each appointment. The team was very cooperative. Which dental clinic makes sure that their patient is even well fed? The Dental Bond!! Post procedure checks are also wonderfully managed. A huge Thank You to the entire team of Dental Bond. Dr.Farhath / Dr.Husain - You guys run an amazing ship!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This dentist is a dream! I usually hate dentists and am super afraid of them but these people calmed me down and did a real clean, painless treatment. They explain the problems you have and the treatment suggested. If I ever have any tooth issues, these are the people I'll definitely go to. Pain in non-existent in their dictionary. They are fun to go to too!

review:
Appointment with Dr. Hussain
Amazing friendly and cooperative doctor to give feedback and suggestion to improvise from the root cause forever !! 
He gave me the pricing estimate before hand itself which helped me understand if I want to move further; but I had to back out because it went out of my budget. Still he helped me with the scan, xray and explanation of the issue altogether which I have loved discussing with him. Top class latest instruments & apps helped me for a clearer understanding.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I had an extensive treatment and they made my treatment feel like a breeze. I have been to many dentists but I have never seen doctors who are so involved. Also, nobody has ever explained in detail, the way they do. 

If you complain about any pain, they ensure that they reach out to you at regular intervals to check on you. 
Have been going there for about six months but their friendliness makes me believe that I know them for years. They are amazing dentists and even better people. That‚Äôs what makes this place better than any other.
